700545f-a.text:
Boston Road, north from Thwaites Place. Intersecting Boston Road is White Plains Road on which appears the elevated structure of the
I.R.T. White Plains Road subway line.
1917.
700545f-a.folder: Boston Road & Thwaites Place, Bronx, NY

701616f-a.text:
Pelham Parkway North, west from White Plains Road. The 5-story apartment house, in the background, bears No. 615 and is between
Barker Ave. and Bronx Park East.
July 28, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
701616f-a.folder: Pelham Parkway North & White Plains Road, Bronx, NY
701616f-a.original_title: Bronx: Pelham Parkway North - White Plains Road

702147f-a.text:
White Plains Road (foreground), at the N.W. corner of Thwaites Place. The two story frame house, on the extreme right, bears No. 2241.
July 28, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
702147f-a.folder: White Plains Road & Thwaites Place, Bronx, NY
702147f-a.original_title: Bronx: White Plains Road - Thwaites Place
